articles.title: Chiranjeevi Sarja's Funeral: Fans, Friends Bid Final Farewell to Sandalwood Star - News18
articles.description: Noted Kannada actor Chiranjeevi Sarja passed away at the age of 39 years on June 7 in Bengaluru. Actor died after suffering from cardiac arrest. Hundreds of fans gathered outside for the funeral which was held at his brother Dhruva's farmhouse in Bengaluru.
